text: Air Astana is a government owned airline of Kazakhstan. It flies to domestic and international destinations. It's main airports are Almaty International Airport and Nursultan Nazarbayev International Airport. It was founded in October 2001 and started flights on 15 May 2002. == History == In September 2002, Air Astana started flights between Astana and Moscow and started daily flights between Almaty and Moscow. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2001 establishments in Asia Category:Airlines of Asia Category:2000s establishments in Kazakhstan Category:IATA members
title: Air Astana
